attributes.action: Stop government locking us down over the Christmas & new year!
attributes.additional_details: The government need to allow people to make their own choices! We have sacrificed enough! Data is showing that this new variant is mild! People need to now learn to live with this virus, not be dictated into new rules & lockdowns! People have lost precious time with family & friends & making memories listening to the rules for too long & the freedom needs to be given back to the people, & allow us to live again!
attributes.background:
Stop the government from locking us down over Christmas & new years! 
We have been told time after time that Christmas will be different to last year, 
We as free people should be able to make our own decisions! 
Not be ruled by contradicting rules that even the parliament members don’t abide too

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602920
